titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1388) to reauthorize and reform the national service laws.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1388) to reauthorize and reform the national service laws.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-39, by Ms. Matsui.

All points of order against consideration are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 27.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 250.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 182 (Roll no. 131).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 174 (Roll no. 132).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1388) to reauthorize and reform the national service laws.
